Events that occurred on 23 August

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1925 - The first recorded date in the writing of the Lay of Leithian, at Line 557.
1974 - Mythcon 5 at Scripps College in Claremont, California.
1981 - The twenty-fifth episode of the 1981 radio series of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
1990 - The War of the Ring is published in the UK.
1992 - The second part of the 1992 radio series of Farmer Giles of Ham is aired on BBC Radio 5.
1992 - Tolkien Centenary Conference, a combination of Oxonmoot 1992 and Mythcon 23, at Keble College, Oxford.
2006 - The Oxford Tolkien Conference at Exeter College, Oxford.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
